sentences: See näitleja on mänginud mitmes filmis.
Tõnu, tule ja vaata, mis mu filmil viga on.
context: The Estonian word 'film' has two main meanings: 1) photographic film - the physical medium used for photography, consisting of a thin flexible acetate cellulose base in strip or sheet form; 2) motion picture/cinematic work - a creative work intended for demonstration on screen (movie). The word can be modified by numerous prefixes to specify types of films such as 'animafilm' (animated film), 'dokumentaalfilm' (documentary film), 'komöödiafilm' (comedy film), etc.
